Items.Item: Rarity: UNIQUE Nebulis Void Sceptre League: Synthesis Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B LevelReq: 68 Implicits: 1 40% increased Elemental Damage {fractured}{range:1}(15-20)% increased Cast Speed {range:1}(15-20)% increased Cold Damage per 1% Cold Resistance above 75% {range:1}(15-20)% increased Lightning Damage per 1% Lightning Resistance above 75%

Rarity: UNIQUE Call of the Brotherhood Two-Stone Ring Catalyst: Turbulent CatalystQuality: 20 Variant: Pre 2.6.0 Variant: Current Selected Variant: 2 Two-Stone Ring LevelReq: 20 Implicits: 1 {tags:jewellery_resistance}{range:1}+(12-16)% to Cold and Lightning Resistances {tags:jewellery_attribute}{range:0.5}+(15-25) to Intelligence {tags:jewellery_elemental}{range:0.829}(15-25)% increased Lightning Damage {tags:mana}{range:0.5}(30-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate {tags:jewellery_elemental}{variant:1}{range:0.5}50% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage {tags:jewellery_elemental}{variant:2}{range:0.5}40% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen enemies

Rarity: UNIQUE Aegis Aurora Champion Kite Shield Armour: 1257 ArmourBasePercentile: 0.9684 Energy Shield: 256 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 1 Item Level: 82 Quality: 26 Sockets: B-B R LevelReq: 62 Implicits: 0 Chance to Block: 32% (augmented) Armour: 1257 (augmented) Energy Shield: 256 (augmented) 385% increased Armour and Energy Shield +10% to all Elemental Resistances +5% to maximum Cold Resistance +6% Chance to Block Replenishes Energy Shield by 2% of Armour when you Block 19% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills Corrupted

Rarity: UNIQUE Mageblood Heavy Belt LevelReq: 44 Implicits: 1 {tags:jewellery_attribute}{range:1}+(25-35) to Strength {tags:jewellery_attribute}{range:0.817}+(30-50) to Dexterity {tags:jewellery_resistance}{range:0.5}+(15-25)% to Fire Resistance {tags:jewellery_resistance}{range:1}+(15-25)% to Cold Resistance Magic Utility Flask cannot be Used {range:1}Leftmost (2-4) Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed

Rarity: MAGIC Dabbler's Bismuth Flask of the Rainbow Crafted: true Prefix: {range:0.5}FlaskEffectReducedDuration2 Suffix: {range:0.349}FlaskBuffResistancesWhileHealing5_ Quality: 20 LevelReq: 64 Implicits: 2 {crafted}{range:0.841}(60-70)% increased effect {crafted}Gains no Charges during Flask Effect 30% reduced Duration 25% increased effect 38% additional Elemental Resistances during Flask effect

Rarity: UNIQUE Shavronne's Wrappings Occultist's Vestment Energy Shield: 370 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 1 Variant: Pre 1.0.0 Variant: Pre 3.0.0 Variant: Current Selected Variant: 3 Occultist's Vestment Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B-B-B-B LevelReq: 62 Implicits: 1 {range:1}(3-10)% increased Spell Damage {variant:1}{range:0.5}(200-250)% increased Energy Shield {variant:2}{range:0.5}(140-200)% increased Energy Shield {variant:3}{range:0.5}(100-150)% increased Energy Shield 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge {range:0.768}+(30-40)% to Lightning Resistance Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield

Rarity: UNIQUE Melding of the Flesh Cobalt Jewel Limited to: 1 Implicits: 0 {range:0.634}-(80-70)% to All Elemental Resistances Elemental Resistances are capped by your highest Maximum Elemental Resistance instead
